issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: leveldb fails to startup because of NoSuchMethodError

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Are configured as followsï¼š(I used this configuration in version of 5.9.1 is ok.)

<persistenceAdapter>
            <replicatedLevelDB directory="${activemq.data}/leveldb" replicas="3" bind="tcp://0.0.0.0:0" zkAddress="192.168.65.183:2181,192.168.65.184:2181,192.168.65.185:2181" zkPath="/activemq/leveldb-stores" weight="2"/>
            <!-- <kahaDB directory="${activemq.data}/kahadb"/> -->
        </persistenceAdapter>
